features: SOME BY MI : SOME BY MI is a compound word of ‘SOMETHING’ and ‘BY A MIRACLE’. Our brand mission is to make products that stick to the essentials of cosmetics, with safe and clean ingredients with proven efficacy. Through our Skincare products, we hope to bring some positive changes and ‘MIRACLES’ to your skin

MIRACLE TRUCICA CLEAR PAD : Thin, soft cotton pads to reduce skin irritation: The product features thin, soft cotton pads that are designed to reduce skin irritation, making it ideal for those with sensitive skin

KEY INGREDIENTS : The product contains Truecica and Houttuynia Cordata Extract, which can help treat skin inflammation. Additionally, the product is free of 20 types of artificial ingredients and has been dermatologically tested for sensitive skin, making it a safe and natural choice for daily use

MIRACLE LINE : MIRACLE Lines are suitable for acne-prone skin, containing high amounts of Tea Tree Leaf to improve the skin. This line has optimally mixed AHA, BHA, PHA to refine dead skin cells and impurities, and Truecica, an exclusive calming agent, that maintains healthy-looking skin and prevents acne-breakout through pH balance care. Free of 20 harmful ingredients and passed irritation test for sensitive skin

SOME BY US : We make products with proven efficacy only by undergoing strict testing from the planning & developing stages to product launch, in collaboration with various dermatology experts. If you have any questions about our products, please do not hesitate to contact us. Your satisfaction is the ‘First Priority Goal’ of SOME BY MI

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had bought the toner bottle before and loved it So I bought this one that has the toner pads in them as well it works lovely leaves my skin feeling fresh and saves a bunch of products I do wanna say it kight be a little stronger but worth every penny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toner pads
reviews.reviewText: I use this about twice a week and my skin feels so refreshed and clean after use. It has a good slight cooling feeling and I love the smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Starter Acid Pads
reviews.reviewText: These Some By Mi 30 Day Miracle pads are great. They are standard size if you’ve ever tried toner pads before, not the oversized ones that are becoming popular now. They’re your typical pads that are textured on one side, and smoother on the other.I find that these have ampoule toner, but not too much that they drip everywhere. They have a slight minty smell to them, but the scent isn’t overpowering and dissipates quickly. They are slightly moisturizing, but since they’re an acid, you’ll need to moisturize and apply an spf in the daytime (which you should anyway).If you’re used to strong acids like 2% BHA or more, or AHA peels (10% and up), then these might not be strong enough for you. That being said, I love that I can use these twice a day with no irritation. They helped keep my face clear, but I think I need a stronger BHA in my t-zone where I tend to be more oily. If you’re scared of acids, haven’t really tried them before, or have sensitive skin, you should give these a shot!For reference, I have normal/combo skin. Normal in the winter, but get oily in my t-zone in the summer or if my skin gets dehydrated. I have sensitivities to fragrance and alcohol. These did not irritate my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must buy toner
reviews.reviewText: These toner pads were actually incredible, they left my skin feeling so cool and refreshing in my skin care process, will be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time buying these and I really like the way they make my skin feel and I really see the difference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and gentle!
reviews.reviewText: Love these toner pads, they smell fresh and offer gentle exfoliation without that burning feeling.Great for sensitive skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars helps with texture, kinda small
reviews.reviewText: i’ve used this product for 2-3 weeks now and i can say this product definitely helps with any texture you may have on your face. your face will feel super clean after using these. i like to use them as a mini sheet mask and use two a day (one on each cheek). they are a bit small, but they are really well soaked.(hack: flip the container upside down while you store it so the top pads stay saturated!)if you have a face with more surface then i recommend getting the mediheal toner pads because they have big square shaped pads that you’d be able to use more as a mask :)
